basic_info.description: Hello, welcome to my portfolio! My name is Tim Maupin and currently I am student at the DeltaV learning how to become a software devloper! I am hoping to be done by the end of July 2023. Before I attended DeltaV I was playing rubgy professionally both in Europe and here America, I had no prior expperience with coding beforehand. So far I have learned about CSS, vanialla JS, and am currently leanring and trying to become mroe comfortable with React.

projects.title: Claws and Paws Adoption
projects.description: This was my first project dealing with coding. The reason we made this website is that we wanted to make it easier for people to find the right pet for themselves in whatever situation they were currently in.

projects.title: OddDuck
projects.description: This project was about showing a companies product and allowing a user to pics which product they wanted. It took me 4 lab sessions to finish. I took the amount of times someone click on a product and showcased that popularity in a chart.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
